snippet.title: Starbyte Super Soccer (Amiga) (Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Starbyte Super Soccer (c)1991 Starbyte Software
Intro-Music by: CZ Tunes (http://www.cz-tunes.de)

Testberichte und Kommentare zum Spiel: http://www.kultboy.com/testbericht-uebersicht/1221/

A commercial german Soccer Manager from the early Nineties. A very popular genre in Germany even nowadays - but this one has less graphics than the Amiga-classics "Bundesliga Manager Professional", "Anstoss" or any Managergame else I can remember (on the Amiga). And...no Sound at all. Funny thing that you have the option to turn it off in the options. :)



__________________________________
about "Yet unreleased Gameplay Videos":
------------------------------------------------------------
There are still a few Games which didn`t make it to YouTube - hard to believe, but true. I just...DIG THEM OUT ! :) This is only Gameplayfootage to give you an overview of the Game (no longplay). It`s simple and it`s short - but if you`re tired of the 50th Videoupload of "Turrican", "The Last Ninja" or "R-Type" in the Retro-Community on YouTube...maybe you`ll find some Games you`ve never seen before...just over here.

Please keep in mind that YT-Videos are only shown in 25 or 30 frames per second. And there`s always a massive re-encode done (double-trouble-mode: Videoeditor AND YouTube after the upload). So some of these unbelievable smooth running & good looking & awesome sounding Games - with 50 fps or more on NTSC - can`t be shown over here like if you`re playing them for real. No matter if you`re playing them on a real Hardware or an Emulator: the experience with gfx/sound/scrolling will be MUCH better than any YouTube-Video will ever be able to capture.

Rate & Subscribe & Whatever (yeah, you know the stuff :)) to keep them coming. Thanks for your Support! :)
---------------------------------------
